xwikidoc.title: NewCandidateSheet

use.name: use
use.values: currentPage=Always on this page|onDemand=On demand|always=Always on this wiki

xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} $xwiki.ssx.use("RecruitmentApp.NewCandidateSheet") #set($jobDoc = $xwiki.getDocument("JobArea.${request.job}")) #set($candidateObj = $jobDoc.newObject("RecruitmentApp.RecruitmentAppClass")) #set($jobName = $request.job) #if($request.step == "apply") {{html wiki="true"}}
== Apply to this job ==

$jobDoc.display("first_name", "edit", $candidateObj)

$jobDoc.display("last_name", "edit", $candidateObj)

$jobDoc.display("email", "edit", $candidateObj)

$jobDoc.display("phone", "edit", $candidateObj)

$jobDoc.display("skype", "edit", $candidateObj)

$jobDoc.display("sourceType", "edit", $candidateObj)


$jobDoc.display("office", "edit", $candidateObj)
##
##
## $jobDoc.display("department", "edit", $candidateObj) ##

$jobDoc.display("current_position", "edit", $candidateObj)

$jobDoc.display("current_company", "edit", $candidateObj)
{{/html}} #else #set($firstName = $request.get("RecruitmentApp.RecruitmentAppClass_0_first_name")) #set($lastName = $request.get("RecruitmentApp.RecruitmentAppClass_0_last_name")) #set($docName = $xwiki.getUniquePageName("RecruitmentApp", "$firstName $lastName")) #set($valDoc = $xwiki.getDocument("RecruitmentApp.${docName}")) $valDoc.newObject("RecruitmentApp.RecruitmentAppClass") #set($ok = $valDoc.updateObjectFromRequest("RecruitmentApp.RecruitmentAppClass")) #set($recruitmentObj = $valDoc.getObject("RecruitmentApp.RecruitmentAppClass")) $valDoc.setTitle("$firstName $lastName") $recruitmentObj.set("applyDate", $datetool.get('dd/MM/yyyy')) $recruitmentObj.set("jobPosition", $jobName) $valDoc.save() #end {{/velocity}}
